title: Disconnect in Champ select while in series....... -__-
body: While plugged in with my ethernet cabel I somehow lose connection while searching up counters on the internet while in champ select.....then without any choice I am unable to select a champion and now its considered as a loss in my series!! SO FRUSTRATING!! Anyway we can get a reconnect button in champ select if someone losses connection somehow??? I don't deserve a loss for that crap!! Come on........

replies.body: Champion select on the updated client currently has an attempting to reconnect feature.  It sounds like you might have a bad connection that's completely getting kicked off champion select.  You should run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, and test it over a custom game to be sure it works.  I hope that helps!

Thanks for the response but It only happens every now and again. I play all the time and it doesn't lose connection. And then of course I get in a series and it freezes....just unlucky I guess. You said updated client has an attempting to reconnect figure? Is that in the beta client? Otherwise I have the updated version and didnt even get the chance to try and reconnect. I could browse through the internet just fine in the mean time..
